item.title: Philadelphia Eagles End Kansas City’s Quest For ‘Three-Peat’ In Spectacular Fashion
item.description: After a shaky 2-2 start, the Eagles peaked at the right moment, bringing another Lombardi Trophy to Philadelphia.

item.title: NFL Fumbles Chance To Entertain All Americans With Its Uninspiring Halftime Show
item.description: When the NFL chooses a Grammy-winning rapper, it should ensure he will produce a show that connects with a wide audience.

item.title: Indiana GOP Considers Forcing Ugly, Unreliable Energy On Unwilling Towns

item.title: Democrats’ Baseless Attacks On Linda McMahon’s Education Experience Fall Apart With One Look At Her Record
item.description: McMahon was a member of Connecticut's board of education. She serves on Sacred Heart University’s board of trustees and is its treasurer.

item.title: 5 Reasons Trump’s Second Term Promises To Be More Effective Than His First
item.description: There are several noteworthy factors that explain why the second Trump administration is outshining the first.
